captions.text: I CAN'T WAIT TO MEET YOUR NEW ROOMMATE.
I THOUGHT YOU SAID HE LEFT THREE HOURS BEFORE
DO YOU THINK HE HAD CAR TROUBLE?
>>BECAUSE ANYTHING FASTER THAN A DONKEY IS
TRIBULATION, YOU KNOW THE WAY HOME.
>>I APOLOGIZE FOR ALL DELAY, BUT SOME DEVIL WORSHIPPING
MOTORCYCLISTS ATTEMPTED TO PASS US ON THE FREEWAY.
>>OH, DO I DARE ASK WHAT YOU DID TO HIM?
>>TRIBULATION HOWEVER DONKEY KICKED THEM BACK TO THE FIERY
NOW WHICH OF YOU IS TO BE MY BRIDE?
>>AH, THIS ONE COMES FROM GOOD STALK.
HER STRONG LEGS WILL BE MOST USEFUL DURING THE FALL HARVEST.
>>PLENTY OF WOMB FOR THE CHILD TO GROW,
BUT NOT ENOUGH TO SPOIL THE CHILD.
THIS IS JUST A DATE NOT A WEDDING AUCTION.
>>IT'S WHERE YOU INVITE SOMEONE TO DO AN ACTIVITY SO YOU CAN
IT SOUNDS LIKE-- >>IT'S NOT THE DEVIL'S WORK.
>>I WAS GOING TO SAY IT SOUNDS LIKE A WASTE OF MONEY.
VIOLETS ARE BLUE, BOTH ARE USELESS.

YOU NEED TO WAKE UP AND STEP INTO THE 21ST
CENTURY JEDIDIAH.
YOUR VIEWS ON WOMEN ARE EXTREMELY ATEQUATED.
LET ME GUESS, YOU'LL ONLY BE HAPPY IF YOUR
FUTURE WIFE BEARS YOU A SON.
AND NO ONE SUFFERS MORE THAN A MAN WHO RAISETH A GIRL.
WHY DON'T WE PLAY SOME MINI GOLF OKAY?

I WOULD BE HAPPY TO BEAT YOU UNTIL YOU ARE
CLEANSED.

THE CLUB IS USED TO HIT THE BALL INTO THE
WHOLE.

>>I HAVEN'T PLAYED A GAME SINCE I LEFT MY
PARENT'S
MY MOTHER WAS NOT ONE TO CODDLE HER CHILDREN.
>>IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING MY BIRTH THE MIDWIFE PROCEEDED
TO SLAP MY BUTTOCKS AND THEN MY FATHER BENT DOWN AND
WHISPERED INTO MY TINY EAR, "YOU CAN CRY NOW,
LET'S JUST GO GET SOME ICE CREAM.
>>THE UNNATURAL FREEZING OF CREAM OUTSIDE THE WINTER
FORTUNATELY, I BROUGHT SOME OATS AND TWIG
YEAH, THAT WASN'T MY WORST DATE.

comments.author: Noor05

comments.text:
Bad form, Studio C.
I'm not trying to troll. I'm actually a fan. But relying on an inaccurate 
and disrespectful stereotype of a devout group of people is heart-sickening 
to me. Yes, the Puritans lived by a strict moral code and had some 
Calvinist theology that most people find weird today. But don't a lot of 
people have similar feelings about Mormons? We owe so much to the Puritans 
culturally, religiously, and politically in America today. I understand you 
can't take things too seriously when making comedy sketches but would you 
do a sketch like this about a Catholic roommate? A Jewish roommate? Of 
course you wouldn't.
I love so much of your work. Please don't cheapen yourselves like this.
*Descending soapbox*﻿
comments.author: Chelsea Mortensen

comments.text:
I didn't say that they had to use it for every religion. I said that I 
would want them to treat other religions with the same courtesy that I 
would want my religion to be treated with.
comments.author: Chelsea Mortensen

comments.text:
Oh, so it's only "right" to use aspects of a religion and make a skit based 
off of that if they do it for EVERY religion out there? That's entirely 
illogical. You should burn your soapbox, as you clearly have no idea of 
what is offensive and what is not.

comments.text: Err... Vote me for president.

comments.text:
If every member of your religion were dead, would you still want people to 
treat it with honesty and respect?

comments.text:
